message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I think it would be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I've seen similar products selling for that price elsewhere.
I understand you've seen similar products for less, Bob, but I assure you this one is higher quality. How about we settle in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your confidence in the product's quality, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $115. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I can't go any lower than $105. This is my final offer.
